allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: TrackPro SaaS platform - Sprint 1-6 complete

Complete implementation of first-party tracking SaaS platform with:

- Monorepo structure \(Turborepo + pnpm\)
- NestJS API with JWT authentication and RBAC
- Next.js 15 dashboard with App Router
- High-performance ingest service \(Fastify\)
- Background workers \(BullMQ\)
- Prisma ORM + MySQL for core data
- ClickHouse for analytics/events
- Redis for caching and queues

Features implemented:
- Multi-tenant architecture
- Event tracking and collection
- Meta CAPI integration
- Analytics dashboard with charts
- LGPD/Privacy compliance \(consent, retention, anonymization\)
- Data exports \(CSV, JSON, Parquet\)
- Admin panel \(queues, audit logs\)
- Observability \(structured logs, health checks, metrics\)
- Security hardening \(Helmet, CORS, rate limiting\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
